subject: Automobile Racing
New Models, Design and Products
Fuel Efficiency
Le Mans Auto Race
lead_paragraph: At 475 kilograms, the revolutionary DeltaWing is half the weight of the other Le Mans cars, has half the horsepower and half the aerodynamic drag. But it's nearly as fast.
snippet: At 475 kilograms, the revolutionary DeltaWing is half the weight of the other Le Mans cars, has half the horsepower and half the aerodynamic drag. But it's nearly as fast.
